text.name: system_description
text.text: The CPS-1 or Capcom Play System 1 is an arcade board from Capcom that debuted in 1988 with the game Forgotten Worlds. Street Fighter II, one of the most popular fighting games of all time, used this system. The system has fallen victim to several altered versions of its games.
